channel.title: Need help fixing some of my shops!
channel.description:
Right, I've got my first server so I aint shit hot at cooding (I'm a noob) So I just wonted to know how do I stop the shop from loging people out when you trade or talk to the shop? :confused:
Please help me. ;D
